response.overview: Achille, a young man, has been alone in his apartment for several months. He lives a repetitive routine at home, shut away, spending his days doing nothing but drinking coffee, eating cereal, watching TV, and sleeping... He never goes out and always has his groceries delivered. One morning, like every other morning, Achille is eating cerealâ€”but on that particular morning, he runs out...
response.title: Cereale Killer
